pkgmetadata.longdescription: ICS via a Shiny Application // Performs Invariant Coordinate Selection (ICS) (Tyler, Critchley, Duembgen and Oja (2009) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2009.00706.x) and especially ICS for multivariate outlier detection with application to quality control (Archimbaud, Nordhausen, Ruiz-Gazen (2018) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2018.06.011) using a shiny app.
